mapper.select: select c.cateNo cateNo, c.id id, c.cateName cateName, c.description description, c.regDate regDate, count(p.cateNo) count from category c, post p where c.cateNo = p.cateNo(+) and id=#{id} group by c.cateNo, c.id, c.cateName, c.description, c.regDate
